activities: Medical Informatics Engineering (MIE) offers a web-based suite of health information technology products that are easy to use, flexible and cost effective.  MIE solutions are employed by small, specialty and group physician practices; Fortune 500 enterprise employee health clinics; and safety net providers caring for the indigent and uninsured.  MIE solutions include chronic disease management, occupational health, personal health record, patient portal, and wellness modules.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Computer Services - (CSV)Health Care Services - (HCS)Information Services - (INF)
personaldata: MIE processes personal data for our physicians' office and corporate employee health clinic clients.  The personal data processed includes demographic data and personal health information for individual patients.
recoursemech: Medical Informatics Engineering, Inc. has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus.
